author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Can you add `[compat]` for julia? See https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/compatibility/
Okay. ~~Should I reopen a PR via `@JuliaRegistrator register()`?~~  @fredrikekre

I tried to create a release but ran into this error:
```
POST https://api.github.com/repos/thautwarm/PrettyPrint.jl/releases: 422 Validation Failed [{Resource:Release Field:tag_name Code:already_exists Message:}]
```
To retry, comment on this PR with the phrase `TagBot tag`.
cc: @christopher-dG
